item.title: Creative Video Editor for 2-5 Minute Videos - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a highly creative video editor to join our team. The ideal candidate should have experience editing videos between 2 to 5 minutes in length. Proficiency in Premiere Pro and After Effects is a must, along with a strong understanding of graphics and visual effects. The editor will be responsible for enhancing the overall visual appeal of our videos, ensuring seamless transitions, and adding engaging effects to captivate our audience. Attention to detail and the ability to bring concepts to life through editing are essential. If you are a talented video editor with a passion for storytelling and creating visually stunning videos, we would love to hear from you.

Is a PLUS if you have knowleadge about movies, films or have made similar edits in the past.

Skills required:
- Video editing
- Premiere Pro
- After Effects
- Graphics
- Visual effects

Hourly Range: $5.00-$8.00

item.title: Looking video editors for creating 1 to 3 minutes long YouTube videos - Upwork
item.description:
I'm looking for experienced video editors to create digital tutorial videos.

What you have to do?

- Recording, narration and editing of videos. (videos are screen-recorded)
- Video length from 1 to 3 minutes
- Payment: $2 per video topic
- 20 topics per week
Example video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nQKwELwSbfk

I'm looking for someone who's good at following instructions and likes to deliver a well-done job, eager to learn, doesn't like to cut corners, and DOESN'T HAVE A STRONG ACCENT.

There is the possibility of making videos longer than 3 minutes for which we would review the cost.

I would like to know if you have had previous experiences in similar jobs.

Do you agree with the proposed price? (if not, do not apply)
Do you have demonstrable previous experience? (if not, do not apply)


Budget: $200

item.title: Creating 3 Viral Amazon Selling Shorts a Week Video Editor & Planner - Upwork
item.description:
Hi!

We're looking for a Video editor, visual effects & motion graphics expert to join our team.

Here is an example of what we did recently: https://www.youtube.com/shorts/nY-uKejb_zo

You'll be in charge of the following:

1. Creating viral videos based on Amazon selling & 70% of videos need to feature our software but not in a way that we're forcing it to the audience but more on a subtle approach.

2 You'll have to create stories & scripts with same AI voice we're using in video above.

3. You'll have to install and learn our chrome extension finding clever ways to promote it without forcing it to the audience.

4. Create a minimum of 3 shorts a week and 1 video.

5. Find the b roll and footage needed

6. record the functions of our tool when needed in your videos

We're able to pay you around $75 per week at a starting wage. We will review your work after 2 month unless we notice something really poor quality.

We want someone who is interested in growing the companies userbase in return we will also give bonuses for hitting certain goals.

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 23, 2024 14:59 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Visual Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing
Skills: Visual Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing
Country: United Kingdom

item.title: Number counter on right hand side of video connecting to sound bites - Upwork
item.description:
Hi there,

We have done a world record for the longest table tennis rally which you can see here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5s_ZWerSL8k

We want to have a number counter in the top right hand corner to represent each time we hit the ball. An example of this is in this video here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GEhNQE786LA

I have the full file on a wetransfer link its 13 hours long. Is this something you can produce using an AI tool? The counter could go up using the sound bites when the ball has been hit?

Thanks,
Dan

item.title: #4 LONG-TERM - Voiceover Artist needed for BOXING Celebrity News Youtube Videos - Upwork
item.description:
Hello,

We run a YouTube channel about BOXING Celebrity News and we’re looking for Male Voiceover Artist who can do the Voiceover for our channel.

The length of the videos will be around 8-14 minutes each.

This is a fantastic job opportunity available for anyone who can meet certain criteria. We are looking for a script writer who is extremely detail-oriented, can follow directions, and has a positive attitude!  

Here's just some of the criteria that this person would meet:  
- Good tonality
- Has their own computer and highspeed Internet connection.  
- Speaks and reads English fluently.  
- Has a “can-do” attitude while hitting deadlines and committing fully to the task at hand  

You will need to Narrate scripts similar to these channels:

https://www.youtube.com/@FightersCornerNews

https://www.youtube.com/@Fighttoday

https://www.youtube.com/@BoxingWorld2024/videos

https://www.youtube.com/@FightFuryUpdates/videos

We would provide you with the scripts

PLEASE NOTE: You must have experience as Voiceover Artist in This Niche.

IMPORTANT: Also, if you’ve ever Narrate any scripts for Previous or currently youtube channel in this niche, please attach samples of your work.

I look forward to hopefully working with you!

Long Term and bonuses and raises are included over time.

300$ is per month based on 20 Video every month, each video is around 8-14 mins Video for 15$ payment.


Budget: $300
Posted On: June 23, 2024 14:53 UTC
Category: Voice Talent
Skills:Casual Tone, Energetic Tone, Male, Voice-Over, Voice Acting, US English Dialect, Male Voice
Skills: Casual Tone, Energetic Tone, Male, Voice-Over, Voice Acting, US English Dialect, Male Voice
Country: Italy

item.title: Graphic Designer and Video Editor For Advertising Agency - Upwork
item.description:
About This Role: As the Graphic Designer and Video Editor your core responsibility will be creating visually compelling content that drives engagement and results for our clients. You are passionate about design and video editing, and you enjoy staying on trend with the latest social media movements. You love brainstorming unique ideas and bringing them to life through your creative skills. You are organized, detail-oriented, and always strive to deliver high-quality work.
You will achieve this through:
Designing and creating GIFs, videos, ad creatives, and Canva templates that align with client brand standards.
Using CapCut for video editing to produce engaging and high-quality content.
Staying updated with social media trends and integrating them into our content strategy.
Generating innovative ideas for campaigns and content.
Building and presenting mood boards to communicate creative concepts effectively.
Organizing and managing creative assets to ensure easy access and use by the team.
Working on internal design needs, including pitch decks, social content, and web designs.
Creating content briefs and developing a structured creative process.
Organizing content and media to ensure smooth workflow and efficiency.
Core Knowledge & Skills:
Responsibilities:
Design visually appealing GIFs, videos, ad creatives, and Canva templates.
Use CapCut for video editing to create engaging content.
Stay current with social media trends and apply them to our content strategy.
Develop unique and innovative ideas for campaigns.
Build mood boards to present creative concepts.
Organize and manage creative assets efficiently.
Collaborate with the team to ensure consistency and quality in all creative outputs.
Address internal design needs, such as pitch decks, social content, and web designs.
Create detailed content briefs for various projects.
Develop a structured creative process to enhance efficiency and creativity.
Organize and manage content and media to streamline workflow.



Hourly Range: $10.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 23, 2024 14:47 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:CapCut, Canva, Social Media Imagery, Landing Page, Banner Ad Design, Advertising Design, Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe After Effects, Video Editing
Skills: CapCut, Canva, Social Media Imagery, Landing Page, Banner Ad Design, Advertising Design, Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe After Effects, Video Editing
Country: United States

item.title: Wedding Video Editor for 2024 Season - Artistic, Aesthetic, & Candid Documentary-Style - Upwork
item.description:
Our motto: "All wedding films are the same... let's end that trend."

Archer Wedding Films is seeking a highly skilled and talented editor to join our team. We value storytelling and creating wedding films that stand out from the rest — that truly tell the story and reflect the personalities of each couple.

If you have a meticulous eye for detail, a passion for documentary storytelling, and an understanding of Hollywood and indie cinema techniques and guidelines, we want to hear from you!

We are looking to replace our old editors, so there is an opportunity for full-time contracts for the right candidate.

DELIVERABLES:

1. Highlight Film: 6-8 minutes (Due 14 days from being hired)
2. Teaser Video: ~1 minute (Due 14 days from being hired)
3. Full-Length Edit: Chronological assembly of footage, featuring full-length ceremony, speeches, and dances for a complete rewind of the day—typically 1 hour long (Due 45 days from being hired)

2-3 rounds of revisions per couple, ensuring their vision is fully realized.

WHAT WE VALUE:

- Storytelling: Our films are not just records of events but narratives that capture the essence and emotions of the day. We aim to end the trend of "all wedding videos are the same."

- Cinematography: We aim for a cinematic look that blends Hollywood, indie, and documentary styles. Our approach is unobtrusive, capturing the most cinematic and emotionally impactful scenes naturally.

- Quality: We strive to be one of the best wedding film teams in the world. Attention to detail and a commitment to excellence are crucial. Our films are aesthetically candid, artistic, and understated, focusing on creating timeless pieces that highlight the beauty of your special day.

VIEW OUR PREVIOUS WORK:

https://vimeo.com/874146687
https://vimeo.com/893125961
https://vimeo.com/937825203

REQUIREMENTS:

- Must understand Hollywood and indie film and documentary cinematography, from Wes Anderson to Tarantino, Deakins, etc.

- Proficiency in color grading, environmental sound, and sound design.

- Ability to emulate film looks, such as super 8mm and 16mm.

- Must have strong internet connection, in order to download our video files from DropBox, Google Drive, or Hightail.

HOW TO APPLY:

If you believe you have what it takes to join our team and our journey to the top of the industry, apply now with your portfolio and relevant experience. Let's make something incredible together.

Budget: $400
Posted On: June 23, 2024 14:40 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Short Video Ad, Showreel, Wedding & Event Video, Footage-Based Video, Color Grading, Dynamic Transition, Video Color Correction, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Documentary
Skills: Short Video Ad, Showreel, Wedding & Event Video, Footage-Based Video, Color Grading, Dynamic Transition, Video Color Correction, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Documentary
Country: United States
click to apply
item.ns0:encoded:
Our motto: "All wedding films are the same... let's end that trend."

Archer Wedding Films is seeking a highly skilled and talented editor to join our team. We value storytelling and creating wedding films that stand out from the rest — that truly tell the story and reflect the personalities of each couple.

If you have a meticulous eye for detail, a passion for documentary storytelling, and an understanding of Hollywood and indie cinema techniques and guidelines, we want to hear from you!

We are looking to replace our old editors, so there is an opportunity for full-time contracts for the right candidate.

DELIVERABLES:

1. Highlight Film: 6-8 minutes (Due 14 days from being hired)
2. Teaser Video: ~1 minute (Due 14 days from being hired)
3. Full-Length Edit: Chronological assembly of footage, featuring full-length ceremony, speeches, and dances for a complete rewind of the day—typically 1 hour long (Due 45 days from being hired)

2-3 rounds of revisions per couple, ensuring their vision is fully realized.

WHAT WE VALUE:

- Storytelling: Our films are not just records of events but narratives that capture the essence and emotions of the day. We aim to end the trend of "all wedding videos are the same."

- Cinematography: We aim for a cinematic look that blends Hollywood, indie, and documentary styles. Our approach is unobtrusive, capturing the most cinematic and emotionally impactful scenes naturally.

- Quality: We strive to be one of the best wedding film teams in the world. Attention to detail and a commitment to excellence are crucial. Our films are aesthetically candid, artistic, and understated, focusing on creating timeless pieces that highlight the beauty of your special day.

VIEW OUR PREVIOUS WORK:

https://vimeo.com/874146687
https://vimeo.com/893125961
https://vimeo.com/937825203

REQUIREMENTS:

- Must understand Hollywood and indie film and documentary cinematography, from Wes Anderson to Tarantino, Deakins, etc.

- Proficiency in color grading, environmental sound, and sound design.

- Ability to emulate film looks, such as super 8mm and 16mm.

- Must have strong internet connection, in order to download our video files from DropBox, Google Drive, or Hightail.

HOW TO APPLY:

If you believe you have what it takes to join our team and our journey to the top of the industry, apply now with your portfolio and relevant experience. Let's make something incredible together.

Budget: $400
Posted On: June 23, 2024 14:40 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Short Video Ad, Showreel, Wedding & Event Video, Footage-Based Video, Color Grading, Dynamic Transition, Video Color Correction, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Documentary
Skills: Short Video Ad, Showreel, Wedding & Event Video, Footage-Based Video, Color Grading, Dynamic Transition, Video Color Correction, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Documentary

item.title: Cartoon Trailer Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are one of the leading tech-driven media and entertainment companies, producing uplifting content in 17 languages for people of all ages. Known for award-winning art and pop culture magazine boredpanda.com and TOP DIY channel Crafty Panda, we fight the world's boredom at an unprecedented speed: 160 million site views per month and 62 billion video views per year. Our team comprises over 600 creative individuals who work from 42 different countries and 4 offices, located in Vilnius, Lithuania.

If you're passionate about making a positive impact on the world and want to be part of a fast-paced, innovative team, then we want to hear from you. We're always looking for talented and motivated people to join us on our mission to fight boredom and bring joy to billions of people worldwide. So why wait? Apply today and join the Pandas!

We are excited to announce that we are currently looking for a talented Cartoon Trailer Editor to join our team.

YOU WILL
● Creating the cartoon trailer by editing from our current content or create the new scene if needed

WHAT WE EXPECT
● Previous work experience on children animations
● Send us samples of your work or a portfolio that displays these works (for children’s content)
● Be able to work on feedback given by the supervisor
● Strong communication and collaboration skills to respond quickly and actively in a fast-paced environment
● English proficiency

WE OFFER
● Remote work
● Young, creative, friendly team and work in a dynamic atmosphere

At the first stage of the selection process, you will need to complete a test task so that we can evaluate your professional skills. Please be ready for this.
We know that applying to a new role takes a lot of work and we sincerely value your time and your interest in Bored Panda. We’re looking forward to receiving your application. If you are
interested in this project, please share us your portfolio and resume in English.


Posted On: June 23, 2024 14:39 UTC
Category: 2D Animation
Skills:Video Editing, Trailer, Animation
Skills: Video Editing, Trailer, Animation
Country: Lithuania
click to apply

item.title: Filming User Generated Content for Luxury Hair Extension Brand - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented UGC creators to film user generated content for our luxury hair extension brand. As the videographer/talent, your primary responsibility will be to capture high-quality footage of our yourself wearing and styling our hair extensions. This content will be used for promotional purposes on our website and social media platforms.

We will need 7 reels per month. This will include:
    - 3x lifestyle reels which will feature you using our product doing lifestyle activities
    - 1x hairstyling tutorial reel
    - 1x hair styling inspiration reel
    - 1x unboxing/review reel to feature the product & packaging as well as the product in use.
    - 1x before & after reel with minimal styling to feature the transformation from simply using our product.

    
Required skills:
    - Videography
    - Video editing
    - Knowledge of lighting and composition
    - Attention to detail
    - Ability to work with models and customers
    - Creativity in capturing unique and engaging footage
    - Understanding of social media culture/trends
    
    Size: Small
    Duration: 1 to 3 months (with possibility for longer term contracts)
    Expertise: Intermediate - Expert

**The video examples provided are not our brand, just an example for reference**

More details upon applying.


Posted On: June 23, 2024 14:26 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:UGC, Testimonial Video, Demo Video, Short Video Ad, Social Media Video, TikTok Video, Unboxing Video, Video Production, Video Editing, Videography, Video Post-Editing
Skills: UGC, Testimonial Video, Demo Video, Short Video Ad, Social Media Video, TikTok Video, Unboxing Video, Video Production, Video Editing, Videography, Video Post-Editing
Country: CAN
